name: tarball_applet_builder
title: Tarball Applet Builder
summary: Builds an applet from a tarball
description:
**This is a low-level app. Consider using "dx-build-applet --remote" instead, which calls this app internally.**

Builds your applet from a .tar.gz File object.

The Applet Builder does the following:

* Unpacks the input tarball
* Builds with `./configure` and `make && make install` (optional; only run if a `./configure` file and a makefile are found, respectively)
* Uploads the resulting applet to DNAnexus and creates an applet

inputSpec.label: Input File
inputSpec.help: A .tar.gz file containing DNAnexus app source code
